name: Idle Magic School
summary: Ever wanted to build and manage a magic academy? Expand your school and upgrade classes. Enroll new students and watch them graduate. Expand, automate and boost school construction with magic coins! Keep an eye out for the ingredients that can brew potions and aid your journey. As you step outside and explore the magic world, the map will reveal details of school, such as dormitories, magic alley and classrooms.
